to harness the technology to reducer the complexity and operational risk of running their banking systems. The announcement was made at the Sibos event in Amsterdam via a video link from Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology, says Steve Ballmer ." No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand." 0 comments POSTED: Friday, Feb. 04, 2011 NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said." I want to make sure that he doesn't put himself in a position where he's going to make bad decisions or bad things can happen around him," Roger Goodell said.
